localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: fireflies.ai & x.ai have partnered to automate the entire meeting process from scheduling to note-taking 📣 record & transcribe your x.ai meetings 🔍 search back through your conversations 📝 share recaps & notes with your team
blogPost.body: fireflies.ai & x.ai have partnered to automate the entire meeting process from scheduling to note-taking 📣 record & transcribe your x.ai meetings 🔍 search back through your conversations 📝 share recaps & notes with your team
blogPost.title: fireflies.ai + x.ai - Record & transcribe meetings scheduled via x.ai
blogPost.author: Krish Ramineni

localize.description: fireflies.ai与x.ai合作，将整个会议流程自动化，从日程安排到记录 📣记录和抄录x.ai会议 🔍搜索回溯您的对话 📝与您的团队分享总结和笔记。
localize.tagline: 通过x.ai记录和抄写预定的会议。

localize.description: fireflies.ai與x.ai合作，將整個會議流程自動化，從日程安排到記錄 📣記錄和抄錄x.ai會議 🔍搜索回溯您的對話 📝與您的團隊分享總結和筆記。
localize.tagline: 通過x.ai記錄和抄寫預定的會議。

previous.excerpt: Gawq unravels echo chambers by serving you algorithm-free news, hyper-focused on transparency, social impact and unbiased reporting. Compare the news, mute the noise, and read between the headlines from over 150+ media sources daily.
previous.title: Gawq - Unbreaking news. Stay informed, mindfully.

localize.description: Gawq通过为您提供无算法的新闻、高度关注透明度、社会影响和公正的报道来揭开回声室的面纱。比较新闻，让噪音静音，并从每天超过150个媒体来源的标题之间阅读。
localize.tagline: 突破性的新闻。掌握信息，心中有数。

localize.description: Gawq通過爲您提供無算法的新聞、高度關注透明度、社會影響和公正的報道來揭開回聲室的面紗。比較新聞，讓噪音靜音，並從每天超過150個媒體來源的標題之間閱讀。
localize.tagline: 突破性的新聞。掌握信息，心中有數。

next.excerpt: Slid is the smartest note-taking Chrome extension for online learning. Take notes with captures from videos, build your own knowledge database, share the knowledge anywhere you want.
next.title: Slid - Capture knowledge from online videos, courses, and webinars

localize.description: Slid是最智能的在线学习笔记Chrome扩展。利用从视频中捕捉的内容做笔记，建立自己的知识数据库，随时随地分享知识。
localize.tagline: 从在线视频、课程和网络研讨会中获取知识。

localize.description: Slid是最智能的在線學習筆記Chrome擴展。利用從視頻中捕捉的內容做筆記，建立自己的知識數據庫，隨時隨地分享知識。
localize.tagline: 從在線視頻、課程和網絡研討會中獲取知識。
